item.title: Rollo Tomassi
item.description: The Plate Theory Plate Theory 1 Keep finding multiple dance partners. Keep flirting, keep teasing. But don’t go too far while in social circle. Yup. Be cocky and funny. Combine it with spinning plates. Use net, not hook. Become prize, worth contesting for. Practise with more than 1 partner. Not one at a time, many at a time. Covertly, subtly.
